checks.name: Sample Inspection
checks.notes:
The CryoCRAB dataset comprises 152,385 sets of raw movie frames, covering 746 datasets from EMPIAR. 

Each EMPIAR dataset typically includes approximately 200 cryo-EM images, consisting of raw movies, motion-corrected full-diff micrographs in MRC format along with estimated background images, and preprocessed full-diff micrographs in HDF5 format

checks.name: Training Data Documentation
checks.notes:
VGGT is trained on a large, diverse collection of 3D/multi-view datasets, including both real-world captures and synthetic scenes. The major datasets include:

Co3Dv2 – real multi-view object/scene captures with 3D information.

BlendMVS – multi-view stereo synthetic data.

MegaDepth – large outdoor multi-view depth dataset.

Kubric – synthetic environment scenes.

ScanNet – indoor captured scenes with depth and poses.

Habitat – diverse environment simulation data.

Replica – high-fidelity indoor scene dataset.

PointOdyssey – dataset with point-cloud/scene geometry.

Virtual KITTI – synthetic driving scenes with perfect 3D annotations.

Aria Synthetic Environments / Aria Digital Twin – synthetic rich environments.
